prompt.title: Talent Recruitment!
prompt.text: Become our partner and contribute together to the development of innovative solutions and the training of future leaders. By joining our network of partners, you will have the opportunity to collaborate on research and development projects, participate in our academic programs, and access a talented pool of students...

become.title: Become a Recruitment Partner
become.text: By becoming a partner of our university, you will have privileged access to an exceptionally dynamic and innovative talent pool to effectively meet your recruitment needs. Our institution is recognized for its academic excellence and for training graduates with strong adaptability, sharp critical thinking, and a deep understanding of advanced technologies. Through this partnership:

cards.title: Direct Meetings with Future Graduates
cards.description: Organize recruitment days, company presentations, and specific workshops on campus to meet students and present career opportunities...

cards.title: Internships and Final Year Projects
cards.description: Offer internships or final year project topics to evaluate in real conditions the skills and ability of students to integrate into your team, while benefiting from their fresh and innovative perspectives on your projects...

cards.title: Participation in Exclusive Events
cards.description: As a partner, you will be invited to participate in exclusive networking and recruitment events, giving you the opportunity to stand out to future graduates...

cards.title: Visibility on University Communication Platforms
cards.description: Enjoy increased visibility among students and faculty through a presence on university communication platforms, including the website, newsletters, and social media.

checkDiplome.title: Degree Verification
checkDiplome.text: Our university offers a dedicated service for verifying the degrees of our engineers, allowing employers, institutions, and professional organizations to confirm the authenticity of the academic qualifications obtained by our graduates. This service aims to facilitate the recruitment process and ensure transparency and reliability of academic information.

orderOnLine.title: Online Request
orderOnLine.text: Access our secure degree verification portal through the university's website. You will need the graduate's basic information, including full name, date of birth, and registration number or degree number.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.text: Our university offers a dedicated service for verifying the degrees of our engineers, allowing employers, institutions, and professional organizations to confirm the authenticity of the academic qualifications obtained by our graduates.
